code: /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */import React from'react';import cn from'classnames';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{activeCategory}from'../../actions/categoriesAction';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Categories(props){var onChange=props.onChange;var categoriesState=useSelector(function(state){return state.categoriesReducer;});var dispatch=useDispatch();var onCategoryChange=function onCategoryChange(event,id){event.preventDefault();dispatch(activeCategory(id));onChange(id);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"catalog-categories nav justify-content-center",children:categoriesState.categoriesData.map(function(value){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"nav-item",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:cn({'nav-link':true,active:value.id===categoriesState.activeCategory}),href:"",onClick:function onClick(event){return onCategoryChange(event,value.id);},children:value.title})},value.id);})});}
